concept.title: Example: Links from term or keyword elements
concept.shortdesc: The keyref attribute enables authors to specify that references to keywords or terms in a DITA topic can be rendered as a link to an associated resource.

conbody.p: In this scenario, a company with well-developed glossary wants to ensure that instances of a term that is defined in the glossary always include a link to the glossary topic.

li.p: An information architect adds values for the keys attribute to all the of the topicref elements that are in the DITA map for the glossary, for example:
li.codeblock: <map> <title>Company-wide glossary</title> <topicref keys="term-1" href="term-1.dita"/> <topicref keys="term-2" href="term-2.dita"/> <topicref keys="term-3" href="term-3.dita"/> <topicref keys="term-4" href="term-4.dita"/> </map>
